name: Turning Turtle
description:
A last minute creation for the Unreal Engine MegaJam 2022. The theme for this MegaJam was: [ As Above, So Below ]

This was created on the VerticalThird twitch stream when @TheMainStark was offering MegaJam & Unreal Engine support.

Turning Turtle is a short and cute 'endless' runner with a world rotation mechanic. At certain stages of the game the world is flipped upside down.

Total time to create this was around 15 hours.

Code: @TheMainStark
Art: @gameDEVbeauty
Audio: Artlist.io

Some technicalities occurred during the end of the day preventing us from submitting!
